author: jsdelfino

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed the instantiation of services and references as well as reference bindings on Composite components. Added an option to SCARuntime to allow the construction of URIs to be configured using an env variable, and code to use that in the reference bindings.

author: jmcconnell
msg: continuum-1016 a rename will work on restart now, still trying to iron out the details for getting this to work correctly on a rename automatically, think I found a potential caching issue in p-sec but need to confirm.  but this allows for recovery from a group project rename without have to resort to digging into the database
